Class ScopePropagationPublisher<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.tracing.instrument.util.ScopePropagationPublisher<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The publisher generic type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Publishers.MicronautPublisher<T>, org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T>

    public class ScopePropagationPublisher<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Publishers.MicronautPublisher<T>
    A Publisher that just propagates tracing state without creating a new span.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
